txt.en: 'The craft of the Elves is wondrous to behold. Though they create more for the love of the art and for the giving of gifts than for any profit.'
'The goods forged in the halls of Elrond are greater than most any across the land.'
'Even the dwarves, with their love of creating, are hard-pressed to match the crafts of the Elves.'
'The details are remarkable! Everything, down to the smallest button, can be found etched with ornate scrollwork.'
